original: de yang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
analyzed: de yang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /

analyzed: de ltar na bskyed pa'i rim pa ma yin no zhe na /

analyzed: gal te rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin na zhal phyag la sogs 'byung bar mi rigs so zhe na /

analyzed: nyes pa med de /
translated: There is no fault.

original: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature free of conceptual elaborations

original: sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas //
analyzed: sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas //
translated: the mantra and the deity are truly present.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir me long dang me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin ye shes rtog pa dang bral ba de nyid gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par snang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir me long dang me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin ye shes rtog pa dang bral ba de nyid gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, like a mirror and the reflection in a mirror, the wisdom that is free from conceptualization appears in the form of a reflection.

analyzed: gal te shes pa de nyid cha gnyis su thal lo zhe na / 'khor ba yongs su dag pa ni //
translated: If it is asked whether it follows that that wisdom is divided into two parts,

analyzed: mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThe complete purity of samsara is called nirvana.‚Äù

analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mi rtog las mi rtog pa gzhan ma yin te dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the nonconceptual is not different from the nonconceptual; they are inseparable.

original: gal te rigs mthun pa gnyen po mi 'thad do zhe na /üîΩthabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: gal te rigs mthun pa gnyen po mi 'thad do zhe na / thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //

analyzed: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //

original: sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug bzhin du //
analyzed: sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug bzhin du //
translated: Like poison killed by mantra,

original: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: samsara has the nature of peace.‚Äù

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir brgyud pa'i gzhung lugs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la bskyed rdzogs gnyis byang chub kyi @252a * //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir brgyud pa'i gzhung lugs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la bskyed rdzogs gnyis byang chub kyi @252a * //
translated: Therefore, for the yogi who possesses the textual system of the tantra, the two, development and completion, are the branches of enlightenment.

original: sems su ro gcig pas dngos pos dngos po dag par byed pa la dngos med ces phra ba dag par byed pa la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: sems su ro gcig pas dngos pos dngos po dag par byed pa la dngos med ces phra ba dag par byed pa la 'gal ba med do //
translated: Since they are of one taste in the mind, there is no contradiction in the purification of entities by entities being called ‚Äúentity‚Äù and the purification of subtle nonentities being called ‚Äúnonentity.‚Äù

original: yang na bde ba chen por rigs gcig kyang de nyid la zlos gnyis su brtags pa yin pas dngos po'i chad ba sel ba dang / dngos med kyi rtog pa sel ba de bzhin no //
analyzed: yang na bde ba chen por rigs gcig kyang de nyid la zlos gnyis su brtags pa yin pas dngos po'i chad ba sel ba dang / dngos med kyi rtog pa sel ba de bzhin no //
translated: Or else, although they are of one type in great bliss, since that is imagined to be a duality, the elimination of the extreme of entity and the elimination of the concept of nonentity are similar.

original: 'dir ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo ma skyes la rkyen gyis skyes te de nyid tha mi dad pa'i dus na 'dzin pa dang bral ba ni bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo ma skyes la rkyen gyis skyes te de nyid tha mi dad pa'i dus na 'dzin pa dang bral ba ni bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Here, the essence of all phenomena is unborn, but it is born from conditions. That itself, at the time of nondifferentiation, is free from grasping and is great bliss.

original: rgyu zung du 'jug pa dang 'bras bu zung du 'jug pa gnyis gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu zung du 'jug pa dang 'bras bu zung du 'jug pa gnyis gcig pa ma yin te /

original: ches gcig pa'i zla ba dang nya gang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ches gcig pa'i zla ba dang nya gang ba bzhin no //
translated: They are not the same, like the full moon and the full moon.

original: tha dad pa ma yin te chos gcig pa'i zla ba de spangs pa las nya gang ba'i zla ba de rnyed pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin te chos gcig pa'i zla ba de spangs pa las nya gang ba'i zla ba de rnyed pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: They are not different, because the full moon is not obtained by abandoning the moon of one dharma.

original: dgos pa med pa ma yin te byang chub kyi sems ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin te rtogs pa brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: dgos pa med pa ma yin te byang chub kyi sems ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin te rtogs pa brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro /
translated: It is not that there is no need for it, because it is not for the purpose of causing the realization of the enlightenment mind that is not realized, but for the purpose of stabilizing the realization.

original: ye shes ni mi rtag par 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ye shes ni mi rtag par 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: Wisdom does not arise as impermanent,

original: rang gi ngo bo la 'phel 'grib med kyang ye shes kyi sa las ye shes kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni ma rig pa bag chags rtsa ba dang bcas pa rkyen gyi stobs kyis de nyid kyi nus pa 'phel zhing rgyas par mngon te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la 'phel 'grib med kyang ye shes kyi sa las ye shes kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni ma rig pa bag chags rtsa ba dang bcas pa rkyen gyi stobs kyis de nyid kyi nus pa 'phel zhing rgyas par mngon te /
translated: because although there is no increase or decrease in its essence, the result of wisdom arises from the stage of wisdom, and the power of that is increased and expanded by the power of the condition of the fundamental latent tendencies of ignorance.

original: dper na zla ba rang gi ngo bo la 'phel 'grib med kyang nyi ma dang nye ba'i dus na zla ba 'grib pa nyid kyis 'grib par mngon te /
analyzed: dper na zla ba rang gi ngo bo la 'phel 'grib med kyang nyi ma dang nye ba'i dus na zla ba 'grib pa nyid kyis 'grib par mngon te /
translated: For example, although the moon has no increase or decrease in its essence, when it is close to the sun, the moon is diminished by the sun, and it is perceived as diminished.

original: nyi ma dang ring ba na zla ba 'phel zhing rgyas pa bzhin no //
analyzed: nyi ma dang ring ba na zla ba 'phel zhing rgyas pa bzhin no //
translated: When it is far from the sun, the moon increases and expands.

original: de bas rgyu mthun pa ni btags pa tsam ma yin te rang gi mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: de bas rgyu mthun pa ni btags pa tsam ma yin te rang gi mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: Therefore, natural outflow is not merely nominal, but is based on its own characteristics.

original: rjes kyi rnal 'byor la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: rjes kyi rnal 'byor la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The subsequent yoga and so on are easy to understand.

original: 'khor lo ni snying po len pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni snying po len pa'i gnas so //
translated: The wheel is the place for taking the essence.

original: thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: All is the wheel of the mandala.üîΩThe complete is the source of phenomena of Vajravarahi, which is made from the melted wheel of the previous buddha.üîΩFrom the bindu, syllable, and sign, and so on, the body is generated.

original: yongs rdzogs ni rdo rje phag mo'i chos kyi 'byung gnas su sngon sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo zhu ba'i ngo bor byas pa las thig le dang yi ge dang mtshan ma la sogs pa bskyed pa'i sku so so'i sngags kyis nam mkha' la bton te de'i ba spu'i
analyzed: yongs rdzogs ni rdo rje phag mo'i chos kyi 'byung gnas su sngon sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo zhu ba'i ngo bor byas pa las thig le dang yi ge dang mtshan ma la sogs pa bskyed pa'i sku so so'i sngags kyis nam mkha' la bton te de'i ba spu'i
translated: The individual mantras are extracted into space.

analyzed: bu ga las byung ba'i khro bo'i tshogs kyi rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i sems can gyi don byas nas rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs pa'o //

analyzed: sku dang gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin te /

analyzed: sdom pha gsum ni rnal 'byor ro //

analyzed: mchog @252b gnas pa ni rab gnas so //

analyzed: thams cad bdag byin brlabs nas kyang //

original: zla mdog tu snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: zla mdog tu snang ba bzhin no //
